bibl.title: Receipt for Wet Nursing Wages from Hermopolis.
bibl.note: Publishes the six fragments of the original receipt, P. Lond. 947 (2) c, as well as four fragments of its copy, P. Lond. 947 (1) l + j + h + b (from the so-called archive of Theognostos). Hermopolis, AD 234/235.

bibl.title: Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno.

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Lond. III, 947 (1) l + j + h + b descr.; 947 (2) c descr. = P. Pintaudi 42
van Minnen Peter, Receipt for Wet Nursing Wages from Hermopolis.
Diletta Minutoli (a cura di), Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno (P.Pintaudi) (Firenze, 2012) pp. 201-206 et pl. XLI.

Publishes the six fragments of the original receipt, P. Lond. 947 (2) c, as well as four fragments of its copy, P. Lond. 947 (1) l + j + h + b (from the so-called archive of Theognostos). Hermopolis, AD 234/235.
